com.rbs.transfer.service

Class TransferServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbs.transfer.service.TransferServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransferService

    @Service
public class TransferServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransferService
    Implements whole lifecycle of transaction state. Rollback model scrollback the withdrawn and deposited amount. TransferService

    • Method Detail

      • transfer

        public boolean transfer(InputData input)
                 throws AccountException,
                        TransferRollbackException
        The method use validator to do relevant transfer amount checks. Checks both source and destination account's existing states. Also does balance checks for source account and make sure it has sufficient funds available to deposit destination account. Responsible to create the transaction and complete it whether transaction state going to be fail or success.
        Specified by:
        transfer in interface TransferService
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AccountException
        TransferRollbackException

      • doTransfer

        private boolean doTransfer(Account sourceAccount,
                           Account destinationAccount,
                           java.math.BigDecimal amount)
                    throws AccountException,
                           TransferRollbackException
        The method creates actual transaction after validation checks. Responsible about transaction state whether it's going to be fail or successful.

      • rollBack

        public void rollBack(java.util.UUID transactionId,
                     Account sourceAccount,
                     Account destinationAccount,
                     java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                     boolean withdrawn,
                     boolean deposited)
              throws TransferRollbackException
        Rollback is responsible to get the transaction back to the previous state It checks whether deposit or withdraw process completed or not. If the amount withdrawn, it puts the amount back to the source account. And if the amount deposited, it withdraw the amount back from destination account.
        Specified by:
        rollBack in interface TransferService
        Parameters:
        transactionId -
        sourceAccount -
        destinationAccount -
        amount -
        withdrawn -
        deposited -
        Throws:
        TransferRollbackException
